data.name: Permanence TD
data.detailed_description:
This game is not about graphics, but about mechanics, of which there are a lot. Although it is based on the classic tower defense gameplay, the devil is in the details. In this game, you can't just build random towers and pass wave after wave. This game will make you think, prepare for every enemy, if you want to win of course

Game features
- 16 types of towers
- 10 types of traps
- 11 types of supporting buildings
- 27 types of enemies
- 11 types of bosses
- build enemy move routes
- endless game mode

data.short_description: Tower defense that will make you think
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Vietnamese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Japanese

  • Processor: 1,6 ГГц or higher
  • Graphics: 1 GB video memory
